content: k1tbl p1 k16 k1tbl p1 k1tbl p1 work chart row 48 round 49 k1tbl p1 k1tbl p1 k16 k1tbl p1 k1tbl p1 work chart row 49 round 50 k1tbl p1 k1tbl p1 k16 k1tbl p1 k1tbl p1 work chart row 50 4th latvian braid rounds 1 - 4 as above page 2 insert a lifeline barber cord or spare cable in round 4 of this latvian braid break cc do not break mc leave it attached on the outside of the mitt ruffle leave mc attached on the outside of the mitt with cc2 round 1 2 k to end round 3 *k1 kfb repeat from * to end 72 stitches round 4 k to end lace row 5 yo k4 sk2p k4 yo k work row 5 & 6 six times per round pm between repeats row 6 k12 repeat rounds 5 & 6 four more times bind off loosely break cc2 twisted rib pick up 48 sts from lifeline and divide evenly onto needle 1 & needle 2 remove lifeline with mc round 1 needle 1 kfb k1tbl p1 to last st kfb repeat on needle 2 52 sts total rounds 2 6 k1tbl p1 to end bind off loosely in pattern 4 thumbs move 12 sts from waste yarn onto needles dividing evenly onto needle 1 and needle 2 pick up 2 additional sts per needle at base of thumb to close the gap 16 sts pm to indicate the beginning of round and join yarn knit for 8 rounds work twisted rib k1tbl p1 for 3 rounds bind off loosely in pattern finishing weave in ends and block lace chart chart is worked from bottom to top all rounds worked from right to left 5 written instructions row 1 k1tbl p k1tbl k18 p k1tbl p row 2 k1tbl p k1tbl k18 p k1tbl p row 3 k1tbl p k1tbl k2 k2tog k2 yo k2 k2tog k2 yo k2 k2tog k2 yo p k1tbl p row 4 k1tbl p k1tbl k18 p k1tbl p row 5 k1tbl p k1tbl k k2tog k2 yo k2 k2tog k2 yo k2 k2tog k2 yo k p k1tbl p row 6 k1tbl p k1tbl k18 p k1tbl p row 7 k1tbl p k1tbl k2tog k2 yo k2 k2tog k2 yo k2 k2tog k2 yo k2 p k1tbl p row 8 k1tbl p k1tbl k18 p k1tbl p row 9 k1tbl p k1tbl k2 k2tog k2 yo k2 k2tog k2 yo k2 k2tog k2 yo p k1tbl p row 10 k1tbl p k1tbl k18 p k1tbl p row 11 k1tbl p k1tbl k k2tog k2 yo k2 k2tog k2 yo k2 k2tog k2 yo k p k1tbl p row 12 k1tbl p k1tbl k18 p k1tbl p row 13 k1tbl p k1tbl k2tog k2 yo k2 k2tog k2 yo k2 k2tog k2 yo k2 p k1tbl p row 14 k1tbl p k1tbl k18 p k1tbl p row 15 k1tbl p k1tbl k2 k2tog k2 yo k2 k2tog k2 yo k2 k2tog
